name: Netflix
desc:
Watch TV shows and movies recommended just for you, including award-winning Netflix original series, movies, and documentaries.

Netflix has something for everyone.
tweet: Watch TV shows and movies recommended just for you

name: Pandora Music
desc:
Pandora gives you a personalized music experience that continually evolves with your tastes.

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres. Or search browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity.
tweet: Pandora gives you a personalized music experience that continually evolves with your tastes

name: Hulu: Watch TV Shows & Movies
desc:
Enjoy all your TV in one place with a new Hulu experience – more personalized and intuitive than ever before.

The choice is yours - select a plan featuring Hulu’s entire streaming library, or if you’ve subscribed through Hulu to a plan that includes Live TV
tweet: Enjoy all your TV in one place with a new Hulu experience

name: MARVEL Contest of Champions
desc: Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!
tweet: Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes
